comments.author: Ambatman
comments.body: Focusing on Pizza is going to make the site limited. I think there was a user this year that created a site to measure how much you would have had with current price of Bitcoin If you invested a certain amount during a certain time period. I doubt if brand would be interested/ pay to compare their product with the value of 10000BTC of Pizza. You can maybe make it possible to toggle between dark and light mode of not implemented yet. Maybe a calculate to help assist in calculating DCA.
